channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bosses are losing the ‘return-to-office’ war as the WFH pyjama army forces them to go hybrid
item.description: Despite all the noise around bosses ditching remote working for good, the world's largest hybrid workspace provider just reported record revenue.

item.title: These stocks offer investors stable growth in a slowing economy and turbulent market, Goldman says
item.description: Goldman Sachs shared a basket of names that may hold up amid fears of a potential recession hitting the U.S. economy.

item.title: Disney makes a profit in streaming, but parks business feels spending pressure
DBS’s next CEO will be Tan Su Shan, the first woman to lead Southeast Asia’s largest bank
item.description: Tan Su Shan will become the first woman CEO in DBS' history when she assumes the top job come March 2025.

item.title: Weekly mortgage refinance demand soars 16% as rates sink to lowest level in over a year
item.description: Mortgage interest rates dropped last week to the lowest level since May 2023, causing a surge in mortgage demand from both homebuyers and especially current homeowners.

item.title: Puma shares slump as sportswear group trims profit forecast
Elon Musk’s backing of Donald Trump is hurting Tesla’s struggling EV business in Europe
item.description: German drugstore chain Rossmann said that Elon Musk's support for Donald Trump, the Republican candidate who calls climate change a hoax, goes against Tesla's mission—and it wants out.

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Wednesday
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares slump 7% on earnings miss from Ozempic maker
Exploding Mercedes-Benz EV prompts parking garage electric vehicle bans in South Korea
item.description: More than 700 residents were evacuated due to water and power outages and the blaze damaged some 140 cars.

item.title: CVS slashes profit outlook on higher medical costs, says top Aetna executive will leave
item.description: CVS said higher medical costs are weighing on its insurance business, and announced Aetna President Brian Kane will step down.

item.title: Reddit's stock falls despite Q2 revenue beat, narrower-than-expected loss
Cathay Pacific is buying up to 60 Airbus jets in $11 billion deal as travel approaches pre-COVID numbers
item.description: Cathay announced that its passenger count had reached 80 percent of its pre-pandemic levels and it hoped to hit 100 percent in early 2025.

item.title: Wednesday's analyst calls: Super Micro Computer earnings reaction, AMD a top pick
item.description: Two names tied to the artificial intelligence trade were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Wednesday.

item.title: SuperMicro unveils 10-for-1 stock split in earnings; shares give back gains
